userreviews.userReview: Jack Wallen has done it again folks!!!!! This book has solidified his place as my #1 Favorite author! And I do not hand that award out lightly! He had me both cheering and weeping, out loud. Once again, I read it all in one sitting. I literally had to force myself to put the book down just to make dinner. Do not let my speed-reading fool you, I read it in one sitting because it is such an amazing and perfect book! No matter what direction he takes, I will be a life-long fan. I will recommend ALL of Jack's books to everyone I know. Whether you are a fan of zombies and horror or not, you will fall in love with Jack's humor and his charming way with words. There really is nothing more you could ask for! With some book series, one could get bored. NOT WITH JACK! He always finds new ways to kill the zombies and new twists and turns you won't see coming! It doesn't get any better then this! At least, not until the next book in series comes out! :)

With baby Jacob on board, Bethany's new role as a mommy keeps adding fuel to the zombie apocalypse fire! Underground safe cities across the US, a mole (damn him!) and a new terrifying breed of zombie (the boners!) that's right, the boners. With an end that will leave you shocked!Another 5 star worthy delivery by Jack, the King of zombies. Cannot wait for the next one, Cry Zombie Cry.Thanks Jack for delivering the best.zombies.ever!
These books ARE SO GOOOOOOOOOOOOOODDDD !! Totally worth the read. Cant wait for #5 !!!
So, we're a year in to the apocolypse and people are still stumbling around making rooky mistakes. Seriously! How are these people even still alive at this point?

description: The I Zombie series continues!Bethany Nitshimi is back and this time she has motherhood on her side. The creators of the Mengele Virus, the Zero Day Collective, continue to beat down the human race in order to reboot mankind. This time, however, the redhead badass with enough brain to feed the entire zombie horde has a new crew on her side. Along with the Zombie Response Team, a tween wrecking machine, a fellow elite hacker, and an attitude prepared to take on the zombie nation, Bethany Nitshimi uses every trick in her post-apocalyptic book to fight back the new and improved horrors that await her on the other side of Hell.
title:
Lie Zombie Lie
      
          (I Zombie #4)
